name: places/ChIJxTy6Q66XJIgRZzQ31oNQVM8
formattedAddress: 515 W 175th St Apt 15, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 515 W 175th St Apt 15, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: I would like to start off by saying that if you are looking for a vocal instructor, look no further. I worked with Brittani for over a year and have felt that she has exceeded expectations as a teacher and mentor. Her fluent knowledge of vocal technique, contemporary and classical style, and human anatomy are apparent and combine with her excellent communication skills and support to make a wonderful teacher. You would be lucky to work with her!

text.text: I would like to start off by saying that if you are looking for a vocal instructor, look no further. originalText.text: I've been taking lessons with Brittani for just over a year now, and under her guidance have seen the growth in skill and confidence in my voice in that time. She has helped me learn so much in understanding and improving my singing. I'm also always impressed by how she has so much knowledge on the voice and anatomy. Excited to see how I can continue to improve with her as my teacher.

text.text: I've been taking lessons with Brittani for just over a year now, and under her guidance have seen the growth in skill and confidence in my voice in that time. She has helped me learn so much in understanding and improving my singing. I'm also always impressed by how she has so much knowledge on the voice and anatomy. Excited to see how I can continue to improve with her as my teacher.

originalText.text:
As of the time of writing this, Brittani has a perfect 5.0 across 21 reviews and I assure you that this is not a scam and she is not paying for reviews.

I've had music instructors that were too strict and instructors that were too kind. Brittani is that rare breed who is empathic, understanding, and encouraging, but also demands that I practice with intent and not just blindly follow her instruction. She is truly invested in making me become a better singer and allows me to discover why certain things are happening with my voice rather than just flat out telling me.

She's extremely invested in my long term vocal health and in building lasting habits that I can apply to all songs and not just the ones we cover in our lessons.

10/10 One of the best instructors I've ever had.

originalText.text: I just started working with Brittani within the past 1-2 months, and I feel like I already have learned so much about singing! She does a great job going into the anatomy and details about how our bodies affect our singing. As a complete beginner, I can already see improvements and cannot wait to continue learning more. I am also able to take the lessons remotely, which doesn't lessen the quality of what I learn whatsoever. I would highly recommend her to someone else that is interested in learning more about voice.

text.text: I just started working with Brittani within the past 1-2 months, and I feel like I already have learned so much about singing! She does a great job going into the anatomy and details about how our bodies affect our singing. As a complete beginner, I can already see improvements and cannot wait to continue learning more. I am also able to take the lessons remotely, which doesn't lessen the quality of what I learn whatsoever. I would highly recommend her to someone else that is interested in learning more about voice.

originalText.text:
Brittani is a joy to be around :)
For those who come to her (like me) with such poor self-esteem and lack of voice confidence you will be so relieved! This lady is such a listener, patient, kind, and inspiring spirit. Also ridiculously astute in anything pertaining the voice. I've learned and have improved a lot in my voice ever since I began to work with her; Britt always tries to come up with the best approach to instruct and work with her pupils (I thank her for that). I'm honored to have found her. She is lovely! She truly is a joy to be around in every singing lesson
